titles.title: To codify the duty-free treatment of imports of straight sawn shingles of western red cedar.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/23/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to codify into law the duty-free treatment of imports of certain straight sawn shingles of western red cedar.
